name: Between Two worlds (Francisco Manuel Gonzalez Martin)
name_original: Between Two worlds (Francisco Manuel Gonzalez Martin)
description:
Game made for the global game jam 2022 with my group of friends: Red Rats Games (including featbear)
It's a platformer where you have to change between two worlds to surpass obstacles

In this you can shoot portals that connects to another portal in the other world

Controls

You can use your personal teleporter using: E

You can shoots portals with: LMB and aim with: RMB

https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/between-two-worlds-5
